name: stuffed sardines
ingredients: Chermoula Marinade: 3 cloves of garlic (crushed), chopped parsley and coriander (quantity unspecified), 2 tsp of lemon juice, 2 tbsp of olive oil, paprika, cumin, ginger, turmeric, salt, pepper, hot sauce (optional)
steps: Prepare the chermoula: Mix all the marinade ingredients (garlic, herbs, lemon juice, olive oil, spices, and seasoning).
On each sardine fillet, put a generous teaspoon of chermoula. Cover with a second fillet (like a sandwich).
Coat the stuffed sardines in flour. Pat well to remove excess.
Heat sunflower oil in a pan.
Cook the stuffed sardine fillets (fried) on both sides until golden brown. Drain.
Serve hot, often accompanied by fries.
